page.description: LAYOUT_RENAME() renames or copies a form, browse, label, letter, or report.
page.syntax: L layout_rename(C layout_name ,C layout_type ,C new_name [,L duplicate [,L flagRefreshControlPanel ]])

argument.name: layout_name
argument.description: The name of a form, browse, label, letter, or report layout.

argument.name: new_name
argument.description: The new name of the layout.

argument.name: duplicate
argument.description:
Logical. Optional. Default = .F.
.T. = Creates a copy of the layout with the new name.
.F. = Renames the existing copy.
